metadata.titel_preek: Sardis: Words About Death And Life

kernfrasen: thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead
nervous systems under trauma and shock
enemy could successfully launch an attack
anchor to hold within every stormy gale
hinge which God has given us

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Life is a narrow vale between the cold and barren peaks of two eternities.

cognitieve_implicaties: Life is small and claustrophobic compared to the infinite.
theologische_implicaties: Without revelation, the afterlife is unreachable and silent.
ethische_implicaties: Human effort to 'look beyond' is futile.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Can lead to nihilism if the 'star' of hope isn't found.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher uses this poetic imagery to contrast the 'wistful hope' of agnosticism with the 'vivid' reality of Easter.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The hinge which God has given us for our faith.

mapping_structuur.doel_element: The validity of all Christian hope

cognitieve_implicaties: If the hinge fails, the whole structure of faith collapses.
theologische_implicaties: The Resurrection is the functional pivot of the Gospel.
ethische_implicaties: Faith must be attached to this specific historical event.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Reduces a cosmic event to a mechanical utility.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: A fresh mechanical metaphor that emphasizes functional necessity over mere ornament.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully weaves the historical fall of Sardis (Military) into the spiritual state of the church (Medical/Biological). The transition from 'physical death' to 'spiritual death' is seamless.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The shift from meteorological/spiritual imagery to clinical/political terminology is jarring.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: The 'winds of God' imply a natural, uncontrollable force, while 'psychotic' implies a treatable mental pathology.

succesvolle_blending.locatie: Description of the Church at Sardis
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses the 'Fluid/Water' domain to explain why the 'Biological/Life' domain is failing (stagnation vs. spring).

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'thief in the night' metaphor by grounding it in the specific historical military failure of Sardis.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Because Cyrus attacked it once by night, the people in Sardis would have understood... 'I will come on thee as a thief'.

risicos.beschrijving: By defining sin primarily as 'deadness' or 'lack of interest,' the moral/legal weight of sin (guilt) is minimized.
risicos.voorbeeld: The least anguished... kind of death may be... physical death. There is the death of purpose and ambition.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The ruins of Sardis under a full moon.
sub_worlds: The streets of the neighborhood (drug use)

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Repetition of 'He had nobody but God' creates a schema of divine exclusivity in the passion narrative.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Redefining 'dead' to include the walking, breathing, and socially active.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Spiritual Vitality as the only true 'Life'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with Easter Sunday (Resurrection) by moving from the 'tomb' of Sardis to the 'victory' of Christ.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the LIFE/DEATH binary, mapped onto biological, military, and social domains. It effectively moves from 'Deadness as Apathy' to 'Life as Resurrection Power.' The preacher avoids the Economic domain (Debt/Transaction) almost entirely, focusing instead on the Ontological (Being/Vitality).

revitalisatie_suggesties.doel_metafoor: Washed in the blood / White garments
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'white garments' to the 'wool-dying business' of Sardis mentioned earlier.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The vats of Sardis could dye wool any color, but only Christ can bleach a soul into the white of victory.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly bridge this using the 'Waking from Sleep' metaphor used in the Cyrus story.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests that political disagreement is a 'sickness' or 'psychosis' rather than a difference of opinion.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Use the 'Winds of God' (Spirit) metaphor more consistently to avoid pathologizing political opponents.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To contrast the 'stagnant' water with 'growth' and 'fruitfulness' rather than just 'animal energy'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using historical narrative as a source domain for conceptual theological mapping.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'rhythm' of the 'Nobody but God' section, CMT reveals this as a 'Force' schemaâ€”God as the only vector of power in a vacuum of human agency.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's focus on the 'experience' of the listener, CMT shows how the preacher is literally re-wiring the listener's definition of 'Life' through mapping.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher uses 'Verticality' (down yet up) and 'Container' (in Christ) to resolve the 'Oxymoron' of being dead yet watchful.

appendices.notities: The preacher uses a 'Supralogical' argument to bypass the cognitive dissonance of the text's paradoxes.
